title: WOF 209: 5 Ways to Draw Young People Back to God
description:
At the recent USCCB meeting, Bishop Barron gave a presentation to all the American bishops in which he offered five ways to draw young people back to God. Today, we discuss each way.

A listener asks which books Bishop Barron would recommend to counter his biology teacher who tells him to read Bertrand Russell and Christopher Hitchens.

Links + Book Recommendations

  • Bishop Barron’s USCCB presentation on “Reaching Out to the Religiously Unaffiliated” (YouTube)
  • William Lane Craig vs. Christopher Hitchens debate (YouTube)
  • StrangeNotions.com
  • “20 Arguments for God’s Existence” by Peter Kreeft
  • The Last Superstition: A Refutation of the New Atheism by Edward Feser
  • Aquinas: A Beginner’s Guide by Edward Feser
  • On Guard: Defending Your Faith with Reason and Precision by William Lane Craig
  • Answering Atheism: How to Make the Case for God with Logic and Charity by Trent Horn
